text: (timjhh) Welcome to the Seattle Scramble! For any game ralated questions, text Tim at 508-887-6954.
(timjhh) Apologies for the downtime! Everything should be good to go now - please resubmit any challenges the site has not accounted for
(timjhh) For "The Manifesto", the challenge begins at "A spectre" and ends with "adversaries?".
(timjhh) If your video will not update due to file size, you can text your submission to Tim and submit a screenshot of the video instead.
